group_1.textRight: ...What a comforting Coordinator you are.

group_1.textLeft: I am honored by such praise.

group_1.textRight: I must say, it feels a bit excessive for a Coordinator.

group_1.textLeft: Well... I pour my personal hobbies into my@work, you might say.

group_1.textRight: Hobbies...

group_1.textLeft: Seeing as how our Coordinators are mostly not from Kamihama...
I try my best to ease their hearts, so many miles@from home.
That's my hope, anyway.

group_1.textRight: I see.
What a kind, noble outlook.

group_1.textLeft: Miss, if I may...

group_1.textRight: Yes?

group_1.textLeft: You said you wished to talk.@Why on Earth would you say that?

group_1.textRight: (...And just like that, she changed the subject.)
(Was it a subject she wished to avoid...?)
Oh, what I wanted to talk with you all about?
Let's see...
(In truth, I came to see whether these three are a threat...)
(Not that I can just tell her that.)
(Nothing for it but a little white lie, I suppose.)
...I'm interested in Puella Care.

group_1.textLeft: In us specifically?

group_1.textRight: Yozuru-san, how would you...
...Describe what Puella Care means to you?

group_1.textLeft: M-means to me?
Puella Care... in general...?

group_1.textRight: Yes. Not the tagline or public relations version,
But what it means to you personally. If you please.

group_1.textLeft: When you ask "what", concretely...
...Do you mean...@What kind of a place Puella Care is...?

group_1.textRight: ...Yes, exactly.

group_1.textLeft: Then, as for what kind of place it is...@I feel free here.

group_1.textRight: Free, you say...  How... enviable.

group_1.textLeft: Enviable...[chara:104000:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:104000:cheek_0:face_mtn_ex_000.exp.json:motion_100:eyeClose_1][chara:104000:lipSynch_1]I apologize...  It seems I'm sounding self-satisifed.

group_1.textRight: Heh heh. Oh, nothing of the sort!
I simply... havent known freedom for so very long...
On which I must blame some of my rudeness.
I am, simply, jealous of you who can taste freedom.
That's all I meant.

group_1.textLeft: You... haven't known freedom...?

group_1.textRight: Hence my intense interest.
...In how Puella Care...
...Lets you be free.

group_1.textLeft: Please forgive me. I've never considered@that question deeply...
But I feel that freedom deep in my heart...
...At the risk of answering a question with@a question, Miss...

group_1.textRight: By all means.

group_1.textLeft: How is that you have not known freedom?
Is this something to do with your birth...?

group_1.textRight: ...I dont know how deeply Puella Care...
...Has researched our affairs...
...But I was born into a fairly old family in Mizuna.

group_1.textLeft: An old family...  Meaning, a strict one...?

group_1.textRight: Oh, absolutely. Strict tutelage since I was very little.
More than enough to stifle knowledge of freedom.

group_1.textLeft: That... sounds much like my family.
And the same lack of freedom.
Oh, not that I mean I'm from an old family or@anything.

group_1.textRight: (So, she was raised in a strict family without@a sense of freedom...)

group_1.textLeft: ...However...
The freest I've ever felt in my life was before@joining Puella Care.
The freest I've ever felt was when...
I was finally able to grieve for my un-free self.

group_1.textRight: ...?  What... exactly do you mean?

group_1.textLeft: Ahh, a customer. I apologize, but I must end this@here...

group_1.textRight: Oh, I don't mind at all.

group_1.textLeft: Thank you for understanding.

group_1.textRight: Oh! Our customer is...!
